# List of Abbreviations {-}

ANN

:   Artificial Neural Network

(D)CNN

:   (Deep) Convolutional Neural Network

DBS

:   Deep Brain Stimulation

LGN

:   Lateral Geniculate Nucleus of the Thalamus

ML

:   Machine Learning

RGC

:   Retinal Ganglion Cell; RGC's cover the back of the retina and their axons bundled together comprise the optic nerves which carry visual information from the eyes to the brain.

V1

:   Primary Visual Cortex

V2

:   Visual Cortex Area V2
